dashboard.passport_title: Write down the numbers of your passport or ID card

dashboard.no_certify: If you do not have English certificate, you can take the INTERNAL ENGLISH EXAM
dashboard.allow: I allow to use my personal imformation
dashboard.difficult: If you have questions or difficulties, please contact us
dashboard.white: Write the number of your document
dashboard.phone_tooltip: Be sure to enter your personal phone number as we need it to support feedback with you
dashboard.graduation_tooltip: Be sure to write your correct place of graduation
dashboard.street_tooltip: Be sure to enter your current address
dashboard.first_name_tooltip: Please write your first name like in passport
dashboard.last_name_tooltip: Please write your last name like in passport
dashboard.passport_serie_tooltip: Please write your first letters in passport
dashboard.passport_number_tooltip: Please write your passport numbers (numbers after letters)
dashboard.passport_photo_tooltip: Make sure that your passport does not exceed two megabytes and that all the necessary data is visible on the photo
dashboard.photo_tooltip: Make sure your photo matches your passport photo and format
dashboard.diploma_photo: Make sure that there is nothing in the photo except for the diploma and all the necessary data are visible correctly
dashboard.english_cert_tooltip: Make sure that there is nothing in the photo except for the certigicate and all the necessary data are visible correctly

landing.rebrand-title: From June 26, 2023, AKFA University will transform into Central Asian University (CAU).
landing.rebrand-desc: This decision is part of our global development and growth strategy to strengthen our position as a leading educational institution in Central Asia. The university's rebranding is based on the trust we have received from numerous students in the Central Asian region, successful partnerships with leading universities worldwide, and the implementation of international higher education standards.
landing.student_life_title_2: Like Never Before at AKFA University
landing.tg_desc: Click the arrow and contact us via Telegram. We are ready to help you!
landing.engineering_desc: We provide students with a first-class academic experience with a focus on research and development, building educational processes in accordance with leading international practices.
landing.business_desc: Business training based on the case method, which is inspired by the Harvard Business School. We prepare students for successful careers as leaders and entrepreneurs.
landing.medical_desc: The mission of the school is to prepare good doctors with comprehensive knowledge, outstanding skills and love for patients, based on advanced international medical education systems.
landing.dental_desc: Through our partnership with ADEE (Association for Dental Education in Europe), we provide our students with a high-quality international program, participate in international competitions, grants, exchange programs, digital education
landing.exp_au_life: Experience student life like never before at
landing.get_scholarship: Get scholarships from the first steps according to your achievements!
landing.scholarship_title: Understanding the importance of support to the applicants, Central Asian University does offer merit scholarship up to 100% to the prospective students who participate and gain the highest scores in the scholarship-based entrance examination.
landing.video-text: From the current video and our AI Tutorial, you can understand how to apply to our university.
landing.student_position_1: First year student of the Engineering School
landing.student_text_1: As President of the Student Council, I would like to express my deep gratitude to all the faculty and administration of AKFA University for the quality program of study and for creating such an exciting and educational environment for us students. I am proud to be a student of AKFA University and grateful that I am given the opportunity to pursue higher education in such a wonderful institution.
landing.student_position_2: First year student of the Business School
landing.student_text_2: I want to express my gratitude to AKFA University for a quality study program. I gained unique experience and knowledge that will help me in my future career. I especially liked the possibility of practical training and the use of advanced technologies in teaching. I would also like to note that AKFA University creates a good atmosphere for students who want to broaden their horizons and meet new people.
